emails.subject: <link="0-0">Webmail System Upgrade </link>
emails.content:
<link="0-2">To all</link> Lawsy <link="0-3-link">account holders</link>,
Due to various emails received by our webmail for phishing emails, users of Lawsy will be upgrading webmail system to 5GB of space. You can <nobr><link="0-4">login to your account</link></nobr> for confirmation and upgrade.
Thanks for bearing with us, Albers Super Markets Co.

emails.subject: <link="23-0">Authorization for legal representative</link>
emails.content:
<link="23-2">To whomever it might concern</link>,
I would like to use Lawsy’s attorney services to represent my lawsuit in the court next week and proceed with the case until it has been resolved. I am defending myself against Story who has filed a case of human rights violation against me. I have <nobr><link="23-3">attached the necessary documents</link></nobr> below.

emails.content:
<link="3-2">Attention</link> Forward Response Agent,
We are expecting to receive Contract Amendment documents from Bryan Milne, Deputy Chief of <link="3-3">Endicott Johnson</link>. The email and its <link="3-4">attachments</link> need to be <link="3-5">urgently</link> reviewed and forwarded to the corporate department.
Thank you for your cooperation,
Natasha Lawsy CEO

emails.content:

Sincerely,
Bryan Milne, Deputy Chief of <link="4-6">Endicot Johnson</link>

emails.content:
<link="15-2">Dear all</link>,

The Top IT Company

With all due respect,
Cox Thomas

Rita Mason, Landskip Yard Care

emails.content:

I have not been able to contact you regarding my pending court case. emails.subject: <link="1-0">Breach of contract</link>
emails.content:
My family-owned business "County Seat" had been sued by a shopper for a breach of contract. The business has been accused of having failed at selling the merchandise at the advertised price.
I would like <nobr><link="1-2">to request</link></nobr> advice on the question whether my company has breached a contract with the shopper under the circumstances.
Thank you,
Jennifer Abell
